page.title: 04Amery Lodge Farm (2)
page.content: Nothing more was recorded until the farm was auctioned in September l920, when it was quoted as a substantially built residence and an excellent set of farm buildings together with a thriving fir plantation of about eighteen years growth known as Campden Gap Coppice, extending to fifteen acres. The total farm area amounted to one hundred and forty two acres and was let on an annual tenancy of One hundred and twenty five pounds. The present complex was built in l970, when the original farmhouse was divided into two dwellings, and five units were built from the outbuildings which were then joined together by three new dwellings, and together with the garaging, the whole forms a square.
